resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up!
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
This email is already in use
Error communicating with server. Please try again.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
We currently only accept United States phone numbers. Please do not enter your number if you are located outside of the US. Thank you, and we will inform you when this has changed in future updates.
Approval is needed to save your photo on your device
Finds Facebook friends who are also using Tapt!
To find friends, Tapt needs permission to view your contacts
Tapt needs access to you\'re facebook friends to find friends.
Your friends haven\'t posted anything yet.
Your school hasn\'t posted anything yet
Tapt needs access to your location so we can find friends that are near you.
Tapt needs your location to find friends near you
Share your opinions publicly or anonymously below…
Is anybody out there?!\n\n Looks like you\’re the first one here. Make a post so the rest of the campus can recognize
Don\’t be #foreveralone \n\n Start adding your friends to Tapt
Your Story \n\n It\’s a ghost town out here! Make a post so the rest of the campus can recognize
Feel the vibrations \n\n add your friends, comment on some stuff, leave the studying for later
